TopicTitle: How to remove poll from thread?

Articles.Content: I may be the dumbest and blindest person alive, but I can't find where to remove the poll from my mod page. I visited every single corner of the thread settings but I can't find it.

Moving this over to the Kerbal Network.

Only admins can remove polls, drop a request in this thread and the next one to see it will take care of it (I'd do it but regular moderators don't have the necessary privileges).
